DOC.brief_title: Pulmonary Embolism Stroke Patient With Patent Foramen Ovale
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion : - age > 18 year old - confirm pulmonary embolism - informed consent - social ensured Exclusion criterion : - pregnancy - age < 18 year old - protect major person ( sense public health ) - consent refuse - MRI contraindication
DOC.criteria: age > 18 year old confirm pulmonary embolism inform consent social ensured pregnancy age < 18 year old protect major person ( sense public health ) consent refuse MRI contraindication
